about_the_game:
You are a time traveling pigeon sent to stop a twisted goose from destroying reality. Along the way, enjoy the freedom of pigeon life as you soar through busy environments, befriend colorful characters, and blanket every visible surface in guano goodness. But you’re no ordinary sky rat. Eat stuff to alter your biology and unlock a strange mix of superpowers and special abilities.

Will you own your reputation as nature’s most notorious bird? It’s all up to you in this silly physics sandbox adventure from HakJak Studios!

  • Physics-based destruction engine. Rain down Armageddon or just smash a few windows. If you can see it, it’s fair game.
  • DNA-powered ability system. Normal bird chromosomes, mutated for your entertainment.
  • Nonlinear comedic narrative. With a huge-brained pigeon scientist to guide you, uncover an absurd sci-fi story packed with ridiculous quests.
  • Hybrid handcrafted and procedural worlds. Explore vibrant settings with themes like pro wrestling, desert demolition, and more!
  • Outlandish talking animals AND people. Discover a new chatty weirdo around every corner.
  • Cutting edge poop tech. Truly state of the art. Don’t hold back.



Become a part of our growing flock! Access game news, updates, and exclusive media on the Pigeon Simulator Discord server.



Get your claws on the game before anyone else by signing up to be a beta tester.



Menace the locals. Cause bajillions in property damage. Save the world.
